casebody.data:
JAMBS O’BRIEN, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. JAMES McCANN et al., Defendants and Appellants.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided November 29, 1873. David McAdam, for appellants. A. Oakey Hall, for respondent.

Opinion by Curtis, J. Monell, and Sedgwick, JJ., concurred.

Action upon an indemnity bond.

Appeal from a judgment for plaintiff.

Judgment affirmed.
